atk-s0402a29:2_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame pubbeva sambodhāti sambodhito pubbeva, ariyamaggappattito aparabhāgeyevāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a29:2_3: Bodhisattasseva satoti bujjhanakasattasseva sato, sammāsambodhiṁ adhigantuṁ ārabhantasseva sato, sambodhiyā vā sattasseva laggasseva sato.
atk-s0402a29:2_4: Dīpaṅkarassa hi bhagavato pādamūle aṭṭhadhammasamodhānena abhinīhārasamiddhito pabhuti tathāgato sammāsambodhiṁ satto laggo “pattabbā mayā esā”ti tadadhigamāya parakkamaṁ amuñcantoyeva āgato, tasmā bodhisattoti vuccati.
atk-s0402a29:2_5: Ko nu khoti katamo nu kho.
atk-s0402a29:2_9: Tassa mayhanti tassa evaṁ bodhisattasseva sato mayhaṁ.
atk-s0402a29:2_10: Chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānanti nibbānaṁ āgamma ārabbha paṭicca chandarāgo vinayaṁ gacchati pahīyati, tasmā nibbānaṁ “chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahāna”nti vuccati.
atk-s0402a29:2_11: Idaṁ lokanissaraṇanti idaṁ nibbānaṁ lokato nissaṭattā lokanissaraṇanti vuccati.
atk-s0402a29:2_14: Ñāṇañca pana me dassananti dvīhipi padehi paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0402a29:6_3: Sāmaññatthena vā cattāro maggā, brahmaññatthena cattāri phalāni.
atk-s0402a29:6_4: Imesu pana catūsupi suttesu khandhalokova kathito.
atk-s0402a29:8_4: Te kira gāyantā naccantā hasantā vicariṁsu.
atk-s0402a29:8_6: Satthā te pakkosāpetvā tesaṁ ovādatthāya idaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a29:8_10: Dantavidaṁsakahasitanti dante dassetvā pāṇiṁ paharantānaṁ mahāsaddena hasitaṁ.
atk-s0402a29:8_11: Setughāto gīteti gīte vo paccayaghāto hotu, sahetukaṁ gītaṁ pajahathāti dīpeti.
atk-s0402a29:8_14: Dhammappamoditānaṁ satanti ettha dhammo vuccati kāraṇaṁ, kenacideva kāraṇena pamuditānaṁ santānaṁ.
atk-s0402a29:8_15: Sitaṁ sitamattāyāti tasmiṁ sitakāraṇe sati yaṁ sitaṁ karotha, taṁ vo sitamattāya aggadante dassetvā pahaṭṭhākāramattadassanāyayeva yuttanti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a29:10_2: Paṭisevanāya natthi tittīti yathā yathā paṭisevati, tathā tathā ruccatiyevāti titti nāma natthi.
atk-s0402a29:10_4: Sace hi mahāsamudde udakaṁ surā bhaveyya, surāsoṇḍo ca maccho hutvā nibbatteyya, tassa tattha carantassapi sayantassapi titti nāma na bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a29:12_2: Na bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hotīti apāye paṭisandhipaccayatāya na laddhakaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a29:12_4: Sukkapakkhe sagge paṭisandhipaccayatāya bhaddakaṁ hoti laddhakaṁ.
atk-s0402a29:12_5: Taṁ pana ekantena sotāpannādīnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ ariyasāvakānaṁyeva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a29:14_0: 111. Aṭṭhame byāpannanti pakatibhāvaṁ jahitvā ṭhitaṁ. Sesaṁ purimasutte vuttanayameva.
atk-s0402a29:16_5: Taṁ kammaṁ kammasamudayāya saṁvattatīti taṁ kammaṁ aññesampi vaṭṭagāmikammānaṁ samudayāya piṇḍakaraṇatthāya saṁvattati.
atk-s0402a29:16_6: Na taṁ kammaṁ kammanirodhāyāti taṁ pana kammaṁ vaṭṭagāmikammānaṁ nirodhatthāya na saṁvattati.
atk-s0402a29:18_5: Yo cetaso sārāgoti yo cittassa rāgo rajjanā rajjitattaṁ, etamahaṁ saṁyojanaṁ vadāmi, bandhanaṁ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0402a29:18_8: Yadā vā tena vipāko ñāto hoti vidito, tadā te ceva dhamme tañca vipākaṁ abhinivatteti.
atk-s0402a29:18_9: Iminā ca padena vipassanā kathitā, tadabhinivattetvāti iminā maggo.
atk-s0402a29:18_11: Paññāya ativijjha passatīti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya nibbijjhitvā passati.
